title: Dark Mode Toggle
description: Add a dark mode option to reduce eye strain during late-night sessions. This would be especially helpful for users who work extended hours.

title: Export Data to CSV
description: Allow users to export their feedback data and analytics to CSV format for further analysis and reporting.

title: Fix Search Bar Not Working on Mobile
description: The search functionality is broken on mobile devices. When typing in the search bar, it doesn't filter results properly.

title: Improve Loading Performance
description: The application takes too long to load, especially on slower internet connections. Consider implementing lazy loading and optimizing assets.

title: Add Email Notifications
description: Send email notifications when feedback status changes or when new comments are added to submitted feedback.

title: Better Error Messages
description: Current error messages are too technical. Make them more user-friendly and actionable.

title: Bulk Actions for Feedback Management
description: Allow administrators to select multiple feedback items and perform bulk actions like status updates or category changes.

title: Mobile App Crashes on iOS
description: The mobile version crashes consistently on iOS 17 when trying to submit new feedback. This is a critical issue affecting user experience.
